name: Foot Joust - Arena
description:
A small side project I created in 3 weeks!

A simple local Android Multiplayer 1v1 Fighting Game.

You and your friend engage in battle against time to knock each other the most out of the ring in to the lava pits bellow.

Use a combination of Blocking, High, Mid and Low attacks and study your opponents moves to defeat them!

There is no traditional health system here. Each High, Mid and Low area of your player has it's own health point which reduce your players weight.

PC Port also coming soon!

Notes:
* Due to the small scale and development time of this project, a highly stable WiFi Network is recommended.

*If it wasn't clear, this does not work over the internet or a large company network with fire-walling. This is designed to be played on a local home WiFi.
